name: Crack in the shell
description:
Please download the desktop version if you have any performance issues with the HTML version. If you still want to play in browser, we recommend Chrome.

Base speaking... is anybody out there?

Waking up on the moon without any clue and a crack in your helmet isn't ideal.  You look around, it feels overwhelming but yet beautiful. Red lights flashing, AI complaining and the oxygen needle is going low pretty fast. BUT you're not alone. Your buddy from the base will try his best to support you're battle against time.

Will you make it?

Controls W,A,S,DMoveMouseLookMMap Credits

- Tch1b0: itch.io, blog, github
- evilc00kie: itch.io, blog, github
-  Music and voice acting: noisetäter
- Font Robtronika
